name: itmightbeinteresting-server
description: Database for podcast It Might Be Interesting

scripts.knex:local: npx knex migrate:rollback && npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run
scripts.knex:heroku: npx heroku run knex migrate:rollback && npx heroku run knex migrate:latest && heroku run knex seed:run
scripts.complete: git push heroku master && npx knex migrate:rollback && npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run && npx heroku run knex migrate:rollback && npx heroku run knex migrate:latest && heroku run knex seed:run

author: Josh Levy
